motivation.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
motivation.author: Unknown

life.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing.
life.author: Marilyn Monroe

life.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
life.author: Helen Keller

love.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
love.author: David Viscott

love.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
love.author: William Shakespeare

love.quote: Being deeply loved gives you strength, while loving gives you courage.
love.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
wisdom.author: Plato

courage.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
courage.author: Mark Twain

courage.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by facing your fears.
courage.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

kindness.quote: Kindness is a language the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
kindness.author: Mark Twain

kindness.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
kindness.author: Dalai Lama

kindness.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
kindness.author: Aesop

growth.quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
growth.author: Napoleon Hill

growth.quote: Growth is never by chance; it’s the result of working together.
growth.author: James Cash Penney

growth.quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
growth.author: Chinese Proverb

learning.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon to change the world.
learning.author: Nelson Mandela

learning.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
learning.author: Benjamin Franklin

change.quote: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
change.author: Mahatma Gandhi

change.quote: Change is the law of life.
change.author: John F. Kennedy

humor.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
humor.author: Charlie Chaplin

humor.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
humor.author: Jim Carrey

humor.quote: I'm not arguing. I'm just explaining why I'm right.
humor.author: Unknown

forgiveness.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
forgiveness.author: Mahatma Gandhi

forgiveness.quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
forgiveness.author: Lewis B. Smedes

forgiveness.quote: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
forgiveness.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

faith.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don’t see the whole staircase.
faith.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

faith.quote: To one with faith, no explanation is needed.
faith.author: Thomas Aquinas

faith.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
faith.author: Theodore Roosevelt

happiness.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama

happiness.quote: Enjoy your life—it's all that matters.
happiness.author: Audrey Hepburn

happiness.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
happiness.author: John Lennon

focus.quote: You can’t depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
focus.author: Mark Twain

focus.quote: Starve your distractions, feed your focus.
focus.author: Unknown

focus.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
focus.author: Tim Ferriss

discipline.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
discipline.author: Jim Rohn

discipline.quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
discipline.author: Jim Rohn

ambition.quote: Ambition is enthusiasm with a purpose.
ambition.author: Frank Tyger

ambition.quote: Keep away from those who try to belittle your ambitions.
ambition.author: Mark Twain

resilience.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
resilience.author: Japanese Proverb

resilience.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
resilience.author: Vince Lombardi

resilience.quote: Resilience is knowing that you are the only one that has the power to pick yourself up.
resilience.author: Mary Holloway

time.quote: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
time.author: Bertrand Russell

time.quote: Lost time is never found again.
time.author: Benjamin Franklin

time.quote: The key is in not spending time, but in investing it.
time.author: Stephen R. Covey

creativity.quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
creativity.author: Maya Angelou

creativity.quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
creativity.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

leadership.quote: Leadership is unlocking people’s potential to become better.
leadership.author: Bill Bradley

leadership.quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
leadership.author: John C. Maxwell

leadership.quote: Leadership is not about titles, positions, or flowcharts. It is about one life influencing another.
leadership.author: John C. Maxwell
